description: This source file contains Python test cases for the license checksum verification in the build process of the oeqa self-test framework. It defines a test class 'LicenseTests' with two specific tests: one verifying checksum handling with spaces and another testing non-matching checksum scenarios.

classes.name: LicenseTests
classes.description: A test class inheriting from OESelftestTestCase, containing tests related to license checksum verification.

methods.name: test_checksum_with_space(self)
methods.description: Tests handling of license files with spaces in their paths during checksum verification.

methods.name: test_nonmatching_checksum(self)
methods.description: Verifies that a mismatch in license file checksum causes the build to fail with an expected error message.
